summary: Accomplished high-energy Executive Manager with 25+ years of experience in manufacturing engineering, turnaround leadership, team building, training, strategic planning, P&L oversight and revenue enhancement. Proven results in operational excellence, Lean and Six Sigma implementations, supplier and customer relationships, and driving continuous improvement across multiple manufacturing sectors.
